gameDetails.name: Lewis & Clark: Bauza & Cathala
gameDetails.description: When playing Lewis & Clark: Bauza & Cathala, a promotional card for Lewis & Clark, the active player takes randomly from the stock two primary resources per player. He can keep up to two resources for himself, placing them on his boats, then he gives the remaining resources to the player of his choice. This player takes up to two resources for himself, then gives the remaining resources to a player of his choice who has not yet received resources from this card. This process continues until all players have had a chance to take resources, at which time any remaining resources are returned to the stock.
